topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bcbab76368722366f80f00#post_54bcbab76368722366f80f00
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bcb93e63687216f0930c00#post_54bcb93e63687216f0930c00
You are aware that the main draw of the series is the characters and not the lore right?[/bq]
So you're trying to get away from me actually understanding the underlying lore better by not talking about the actual lore or underlying story and instead trying to derail into the characters as a means of trying to make it look like you understand the plot more?  Nice try, but no cigar cause you can't say that someone doesn't understand the plot of something then turn around and yank out discussing the plot the second they show that they do understand the story.

The reason why this is illogical is because that would be the equivalent of going "let's talk about 2001 space odyssey's plot" and then next second whenever someone understands the story going "how about let's talk about Dave instead?  Doesn't that sound wonderful?"

topics.body: ARE WE TALKING ABOUT ALIENS OR NOT?
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bcbd0a6368722346091100#post_54bcbd0a6368722346091100
I'll summarize in two sentences:

The first ancestral race(original humans) were extremely advanced but going extinct so they put souls of certain individuals into eggs so as to start evolution on other planets so that their species can return eventually.  The angels and humans are the first ancestral race; Kawarou and Rei have the souls of aliens but the aliens ARE humans.

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bcbd0a6368722346091100#post_54bcbd0a6368722346091100
[spoiler]Basically, Both Adam and Lillith arrived to earth at the same time. Humans spawned from Lillith, And Angels spawned from Adam. (The Angels weren't awoken until an arctic exploration group ended up waking up adam through brief contact with lillith DNA.)[/spoiler]
